segments.text: Hello , I wish to speak to Mr.Zhang .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , how do you do , Mr.Zhang ? This is Mary speaking , I have a present for you from Wu of Beijing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr.Wu had told me that you were coming to Changchun . May I call on you at your hotel tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's all right . Shall we say two in the afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . Then I'll be at your hotel at two .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The hotel is near to People's Square . Its name is Bai Ju Hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's Room 302 on the third floor . But I'll be waiting for you in the lobby , If you can't find me , please page me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll do that , Mr.Zhang , See you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1
